sourcesContent: import { Grid, Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Box, Container } from '@mui/system' import React from 'react' import HolderImage from '../../holder.jpg' import { getOurStory } from '../../util/AdminUtil' import OurStoryBig from './OurStoryBig' import OurStorySmall from './OurStorySmall' const OurStory = () => { // const images = getOurStory(); // const imagePath = images[0].path; return ( the work of a lifetime As an 8 year old boy I would spend my afternoons exploring a small creek near our cabin in Northern Wisconsin. I would walk under the canopy of oak trees exploring, seeking, learning and playing on the creek's banks. When I founded Stone Creek Coffee as a 24 year old it was that ethos that I wanted to infuse into our new company. We continue this work today and welcome you to our coffee family. - Ted, Founder {/* Section for big screens */} {sections.map(section => { return {section.leftImage && } {section.smallHeader} {section.bigHeader} {section.sectionText} {!section.leftImage && } })} ) } export default OurStory
